exm.mng: lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom), fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines, to try and find sth with the help of a clue

lit. an old steed in the stable still aspires to gallop 1000 miles (idiom); fig. aged person with great aspirations
